paragraph.paragraph:
If the current
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/40_object_editor/index object editor contains an EV_CONTAINER
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object , then the following control will be available:
With this control, you can merge two or more instances of EV_CONTAINER together, so that any EV_RADIO_BUTTON contained are grouped.
paragraph.heading: 2Merging
paragraph.paragraph:
To create a new merge,
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop pick an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object of type EV_CONTAINER, and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop it anywhere on the control. This will merge the radio button group of the EV_CONTAINER referenced in the object editor, to the transported one. Each merge, will show up as a new item in the control.
Note: Container objects may only be grouped once, and as such, you will not be permitted to add an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object that is already contained in the list.
paragraph.heading: 2Unmerging
paragraph.paragraph:
To unmerge a container
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object from a group,
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop pick the representation of that
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object from the list, and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop on
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_delete_small_color.png . This will unmerge the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object from the current group of containers.
paragraph.heading: 2Locating group member
paragraph.paragraph:
To locate the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object referenced by a list item in the control, left click the item that you wish to locate. This will display the representation of the associated
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object within the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index layout constructor , and the associated icon will be animated for a short period of time.
